description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The United States of America. A study of the American Commonwealth, its natural resources, people, industries, manufactures, commerce, and its work in literature, science, education and self-government. [By various authors.] Edited by N. S. Shaler ... With many illustrations" Author: SHALER, Nathaniel Southgate. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10413.dd.1." Volume: 01 Page: 45 Place of Publishing: London; America printed Date of Publishing: 1894 Publisher: Sampson Low and Marston Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003355342 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
